title: Tech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Discord’s Family Center update now lets parents monitor weekly purchases
items.description: Discord has rolled out updates to its Family Center, giving guardians more insights into their teens’ usage patterns, including purchases, top interac...

items.title: Perplexity to pay Snap $400M to power search in Snapchat
items.description: Snap said today that it has signed a deal with AI-powered search engine Perplexity to power a new chatbot. As part of the deal, Perplexity will pay Sn...

items.title: Anker-backed hybrid RV startup Evotrex comes out of stealth
items.description: Evotrex joins startups like Lightship, Pebble, and Grounded in trying to disrupt the RV market, which is skewing younger.

items.title: Ventures Platform, one of Africa’s most active early-stage investors, has raised another $64 million
items.description: The Lagos-based firm and one of Africa’s most active early-stage investors is targeting a final close of $75 million for its second fund.

items.title: Google Maps upgrades navigation in India with Gemini, safety alerts
items.description: India becomes the second market after the U.S. to get Gemini-powered navigation on Google Maps.

items.title: The AI Data Center Boom Is Warping the US Economy
items.description: Microsoft, Alphabet, Meta, and Amazon are investing tens of billions in data centers. AI infrastructure is now a key driver of US economic growth.

items.title: Lucid Motors’ chief engineer leaves after 10 years
items.description: Eric Bach, who was once the director of engineering at Tesla, is out amid a larger executive shakeup at the company.

items.title: Apple nears deal to pay Google $1B annually to power new Siri, report says
items.description: Apple is turning to Google's technology to help revamp Siri and power a slate of upcoming features for the voice assistant.

items.title: Cluely’s Roy Lee hints that viral hype is not enough
items.description: Lee declined to share Cluely's financial metrics just four months after boasting how quickly the startup is growing.

items.title: The Pixel 10 Family Is Marked Down on Amazon
items.description: You can snag a discount on all the Pixel 10 phone varieties if you act fast.
